name: Getaway Driver (studiokaboom)
description:
John Driver, longtime struggling artist and otherwise innocent man, was in need of quick money when he went to signup for a rideshare service. John got more than he bargained for when he instead accidentally downloaded the underground ridesharing app for criminals seeking a getaway driver.

Gameplay

Rip through the streets in a getaway vehicle as you pick up loot from active crime scenes. Pay attention to live news broadcasts to see where the next job is taking place. Escape the city to secure your hard earned paycheck.
